description:
[b]BOFIA PROSTITUTO (Cop-Whore)[/b]

2003 Action Flick directed by GonÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â§alo Ferreira and Afonso Cortez. Featuring the Portuguese Legend JOAO PEDRO ALMEIDA, unfortunaly now living in Macau, playing the part of the Cop-Whore, and also JOSE NUNO MATOS, unfortunaly now writing anarchist books, and BRUNO HENRIQUES who keeps on being himself

...features a 3 seconds appearence of the mighty BASILIO VILLAS, the man who locked himself inside Portugal Telecom building pretending to have a bomb, lived 6 months inside a car in front of the portuguese Assembly as a protest against Portugal, etc, etc

The Plot is simple: Xana his kidnapped for not payinh her drugs and GUI MACHADO, her brother and a street wise and  unorthodox police officer is going to save her. But when the full moon shines bright......

[img=http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg91/joelcosta77/gui.jpg]

[i]"Gui Machado: Deluxe Police Officer

Gui Machado: An Underground Man moved by Justice

Gui Machado: More than a Man...

A Story of Violence and Feelings with a sensacional ending..."[/i]

[img=http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg91/joelcosta77/9fotos.jpg]

[b]"Luckly there are guys like ME to take guys like YOU out of streets!"[/b]
Gui Machado. 

SORRY NO SUBTITLES...YET! but i guess you can easily understand the movie...
